name: ml
description: Welcome to the Multi-Organ Segmentation Transformer repository! Our project introduces a cutting-edge approach to multi-organ segmentation in medical imaging, leveraging transformer-based architectures. Our model, named UNETR (UNet Transformers), employs a transformer as the encoder to capture sequence representations of input volumes and effectively grasp global multi-scale information. This design, inspired by the successful "U-shaped" network, ensures accurate delineation of multiple organs from medical images.
author: Vaishnav267
